page.title: 09LEISURE CENTRE ROTHERHAM
page.content: To go swimming at the leisure centre, you go in , pay the money to swim which is around 33p and then you are given a band with a number on it. This number is for your locker in which you keep your clothes and things. When you are changed and have put your clothes in your locker you then put your band round your ankle or wrist.In the changing rooms there are showers,cubicles to get changed in and as you walk through to the pool there are toilets.There 2 seperate pools,a baby pool which is quite shallow and has a slide for small children and a big pool which is suitable for all ages.It is about 2 feet in the shallow end and deepens to about 6feet.There is a big slide for older children and around every half an hour there is a wave machine which makes waves.
